author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Re: Lupin On The Top Ten!
body:
"Yes, it was necessary; it started lain down the path to realizing what she 
was and what she could really do.  It sent her into a fit of depression to 
where she wanted to erase the memory of it from it."

I'm just saying the creators could have thought of something more tasteful 
for her to be embarassed about.

"It's the equivalent of Freeza blowing up Kuririn; without the
loss of their best friend (Kuririn by explosion; Arisu by betrayal), Goku 
and lain might never have reached their true potential."

Freez blowing up Kuririn fits better IMHO. I don't even see what Shinji 
getting off on Asuka has to do with the series.

But I still support Lain.
